Title: Junior Consultant - Data Scientist (Intern)
Description:
We let the future guide us. Join our next generation

Vuoi fare un lavoro che sia davvero significativo e di impatto? In KPMG avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† di aiutare i clienti, la societ√†, le colleghe e i colleghi ad affrontare e risolvere le sfide pi√π attuali e complesse. KPMG Advisory offre servizi di consulenza alle imprese per affiancarle nella trasformazione del business model, nel miglioramento e nella digitalizzazione dei processi, nell'analisi e nella gestione dei rischi, nonch√© supporto nelle operazioni di finanza straordinaria.

Nel particolare, entrerai a far parte del Team di Lighthouse.

La Lighthouse √® il centro di eccellenza di KPMG Advisory che offre soluzioni di Data & Analytics sul mercato.

Unendoti al team, svilupperai soluzioni innovative attingendo dalle nostre competenze globali. Combinerai informatica, matematica, statistica e business per creare analisi predittive, presentandole e comunicandole con professionalit√† e competenza. Opererai in un ambiente orientato all'innovazione tecnologica, occupandoti di Data Science, Data Engineering, progettazione delle informazioni e Data visualization. Abbiamo ricevuto riconoscimenti internazionali per quanto riguarda la nostra capacit√† di interpretare e gestire i dati.

Nello specifico, ti occuperai di:


Analizzare e integrare fonti di dati;
Progettare database per scopi analitici;
Progettare KPI e framework di calcolo pi√π efficienti;
Analizzare processi aziendali e progettare modelli di supporto analitico;
Analizzare, progettare e implementare modelli di reportistica e dashboard di monitoraggio;
Implementare soluzioni analitiche, supportare il lancio e gestire la manutenzione delle applicazioni.


Come As You Are - Le tue competenze e caratteristiche

Questa opportunit√† √® perfetta per te se:


Possiedi una Laurea in economia, matematica, ingegneria matematica, statistica, ingegneria informatica, ingegneria gestionale o informatica;
Hai sviluppato la capacit√† di combinare competenze aziendali con competenze IT, inclusa la modellazione dei dati;
Hai sviluppato Interesse per la business intelligence/data analytics;
Hai una buona padronanza della lingua inglese, preferibilmente con esperienze di studio e/o lavoro all'estero
Possiedi conoscenza di almeno uno dei seguenti database (Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL) e hai sviluppato competenze in SQL; la conoscenza di linguaggi di programmazione rappresenta un vantaggio.


Your Future With Us - Cosa troverai in KPMG


Un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, equo e che rispetta, incoraggia e valorizza le diversit√†
Un contesto stimolante e dinamico che incentiva la creativit√† e il lavoro di squadra
Modalit√† di lavoro ibrida, per promuovere un sano equilibrio tra vita lavorativa e personale
Programmi di formazione e sviluppo avanzati per rimanere sempre aggiornati
Mindset internazionale e progettualit√† innovative
Iniziative incentrate sul benessere psicofisico


Together for Better ‚Äì I nostri valori e il nostro impegno

Leadership, lavoro in team, rispetto di ogni individualit√†, approfondimento continuo, trasparenza, impegno verso la comunit√†, integrit√†: questi sono i Valori di KPMG che danno vita a un ambiente aperto allo scambio di idee e di conoscenza, che permette ai nostri professionisti di esprimere tutto il loro potenziale.

Grazie all‚Äôimpegno nel favorire un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, il nostro Network ha ottenuto le certificazioni ISO 30415, che attesta la conformit√† del Sistema di Gestione per la Diversit√† e l‚ÄôInclusione, e UNI PdR 125, che certifica la parit√† di genere. All‚Äôinterno del nostro Impact Plan - Our Impact Plan (kpmg.com) - trovi riassunte tutte le azioni concrete che stiamo portando avanti su tematiche ambientali, sociali e di governance (ESG).

Unisciti a noi!

I tuoi dati saranno trattati nel pieno rispetto delle disposizioni del Regolamento (UE) n. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation - "GDPR") e successive modifiche. Per ulteriori informazioni, consultare l'informativa sulla privacy di KPMG.

KPMG Advisory S.p.A. garantisce le pari opportunit√†.

Title: Data Scientist
HTML:
About the Company - Mediobanca is the leading investment bank in Italy. Internationally our footprint includes branches in London, Madrid, Paris and New York. Since Mediobanca was founded in 1946, we have been helping Italian businesses growth with premier advisory services and a complete range of credit solutions, offering customized services and the most sophisticated solutions on financial markets, from advisory to lending, capital markets to specialty finance. With our long-standing presence, solid market position, distinctive specialization, excellent service quality and professionals of the finest calibre, Mediobanca‚Äôs corporate customers know they can count on the excellence and exclusivity that have earned us an impeccable reputation over time. Our clients include some of the leading business groups in Italy, plus a significant number of mid-size corporates, to whom we have devoted particular attention over the past ten years. Increasing focus is also being placed on our international clients, for both their cross-border needs and domestic operations. We have introduced new products and targeted new clients in order to meet the challenges posed by today's highly competitive financial markets. As ever it is our clients, along with our professionals and the soundness of our finances, which represent the core values of Mediobanca.



About the Role - Mediobanca is seeking a Data Scientist with a strong statistical background eager to work on the enhancement of the value of financial business related data by applying data-driven methodologies. More specifically, the candidate will:



  • collect, examine, and analyze large amounts of financial data to identify patterns, trends, and opportunities useful for informed investment strategies and business decisions to be taken;
  • utilize advanced statistical methods to develop models for the implementation of business cases;
  • create customized tools and algorithms to automate complex processes, enhance efficiency and provide innovative solutions for business needs;
  • supervise and actively participate to the implementation of the Group's AI data platform;
  • proactively introduce the necessary governance for the implementation of AI use cases.



Responsibilities - In a challenging yet collaborative work environment, the candidate will contribute to oversee several initiatives to move the data agenda forward and will be part of a broader transformation program at Group level without losing sight of regulatory requirements.



Qualifications - We are looking for motivated professionals with 2-4 years of work experience and a Bachelor or Master Degree in quantitative or business related subjects, such as Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, Computer Science.



Required Skills



  • strong knowledge of statistical methodologies, modeling techniques, and machine learning algorithms;
  • advanced programming skills, particularly in languages such as Python, R and one query language like SQL;
  • understanding of fundamental principles of financial activities and capital markets;
  • ability to work both autonomously and in team;
  • excellent communication skills and ability to clearly present analysis results to non-technical stakeholders;
  • strong intellectual curiosity and willingness to explore new approaches;
  • a brief experience on NLP and Generative AI will be considered as a plus;
  • proficiency in both written and spoken Italian and English languages.


Diversity & Inclusion are core values for the Mediobanca Group. All applications are welcome; we value age, background, ability, personal orientation and gender expression diversity.

Title: Data Scientist - Internship (Hybrid - Milan)
Description:
MotorK is the leading sales and marketing technology company in Europe, specialising in the automotive sector. At MotorK, we aim to empower manufacturers and dealerships to sell more with innovative, cloud-based products and services to offer the best digital customer experience.

We are on a fast and ambitious trajectory, serving 90% of the automotive manufacturers. To continue our growth, we are hiring new talents. If you want to spark the future of the automotive world, join us.

We're headquartered in Milan, Italy, where you'll find most of our employees but the teams you'll work with areas across Europe and the UK.


About the Role

We are looking for a motivated and dynamic person to assist in the data extraction, wrangling and analysis for the automation of internal functionalities & systems in MotorK.




Requirements



Medium Python programming skills
Basic of Structured Query Language(SQL) knowledge
Basic understanding of cloud environments, along data analysis and statistics knowledge
Ability to assist in data summarisation, visualization and pre-processing
Willingness to learn and adapt in a dynamic data environment
Team player with a collaborative and critical mindset




Good to have

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
Some prior practical experience in a data-related role or real-time project




Benefits


Paid internship
Meal Vouchers (‚Ç¨7 per working day)
Yearly team building activities
Food canteen at the office





MotorK is an Equal Opportunity Employer and Prohibits Discrimination and Harassment of Any kind. Our company is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at MotorK are based on business needs, job requirements, and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, age, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate.

Title: Data Science Analyst
Description:
For the Central Team of Generali Global Corporate & Commercial (GC&C), we are looking for a Data Science Analyst to join our Insurance Department. Reporting to the Head of Technical Excellence, this position is key to leveraging data insights for comprehensive technical analysis, pricing strategies, and effective portfolio management. With a dynamic, cross-functional approach, the role includes demanding data integration across key domains such as Underwriting, Risk Engineering, and Claims, thereby contributing significantly to the company's strategic objectives. In addition, you will contribute to the development of the sustainability agenda of GC&C, working on carbon emission, green energy, and climate change initiatives.




Main responsibilities:




Portfolio Management

Supporting the analysis of the overall GC&C portfolio results, trends and patterns;
Designing and deploying the portfolio management discipline;
Implementing the portfolio monitoring tools;
Assisting BU in the target setting and supporting BU in achieving targets;
Performing data quality checks at all stages of portfolio management;
Preparation and steering of Portfolio review meetings;
Assisting UW functions in steering the business accordingly.

Innovation

Working collaboratively on pioneering new actuarial tools, integrating Machine Learning algorithms to enhance predictive capabilities;
Actively participate in defining business requirements to evolve the TechEx technology stack, in partnership with Operations;
Facilitate training sessions for the GC&C underwriting community on the TechEx tool suite, promoting skill enhancement and tool.

Sustainability and Net Zero Transition

Driving forward GC&C sustainability initiatives also in collaboration with Group Head Office;
Contributing to the development of a technical framework to embed Net Zero targets into GC&C underwriting strategy.







Requirements

The ideal candidate will meet the following requirements:




Studied Actuarial Science, Mathematics or Statistics or other quantitative disciplines, e.g. Engineering, Physics etc.
Quantitative, analytical mindset, problem solving skills
Insurance business processes knowledge experience is welcome
Ability to build lasting relationships
Strong communication and presentation skills
Familiarity with Python and R is valued
Must be fluent in Italian, English, additional languages are an advantage




Company Profile

Generali is a major player in the global insurance industry ‚Äì a strategic and highly important sector for the growth, development and welfare of modern societies.

Over almost 200 years, we have built a multinational group that is present in more than 50 countries, with 470 companies and nearly 82,000 employees. Our group aims to become the standard bearer and industry leader in the European retail insurance market, building on our existing base of 50 million retail clients, out of an overall total of 72 million.

Global Corporate & Commercial is the Generali Group unit developing P&C business and insurance services for medium and large companies. The unit acts on a global scale and deploys an integrated approach at Group level with a central management team and specialized teams active in individual countries. Through GC&C, Generali aims to become a key world player in the corporate-commercial segment.




Generali is proud to be an inclusive employer that considers applicants regardless of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, disability, religion, political views, marital status or philosophy of life.

If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation or assistance, we will support you during the selection process.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist




Alfa Group √® una realt√† italiana operante dal 1996 nel mondo dell‚ÄôICT. Nel corso degli ultimi 10 anni abbiamo focalizzato le nostre competenze, tecnologie, risorse, partnership ed alleanze strategiche nel settore Cybersecurity, per l‚Äôambito Vulnerability & Cyber risk Management, e nel settore Antifrode, per la messa in sicurezza dei pagamenti digitali, con l‚Äôobiettivo di accompagnare le aziende nel processo di Digital Transformation e di supportarle attraverso la prevenzione e il contrasto di minacce informatiche e frodi.

In Italia il Gruppo √® presente su Roma, Milano, Bologna e Porto San Giorgio con un team di oltre 160 professionisti tra Dipendenti e Collaboratori, con oltre 150 Clienti attivi.




Responsabilit√†/Attivit√†:




Essere responsabile di sviluppare strategie per l'analisi dei dati, preparare i dati per l'analisi, esplorare, analizzare e visualizzare i dati attraverso strumenti di coding/scripting quali SQL/Javascript/Python/R/SAS e software di Data Visualization (PowerBI, Tableau, SAS). Essere in grado di creare modelli statistici predittivi con i dati utilizzando linguaggi di programmazione quali Python e R, nonch√© di implementare i modelli all‚Äôinterno di architetture software applicative. Conoscere e applicare i principali algoritmi di esplorazione dati e modellizzazione (regressione, Gradient Boosting, alberi decisionali, Random Forest, etc.) e approfondisce i principali aspetti legati ai BigData, tra cui l‚Äôutilizzo di DB relazionali, non relazionali e data lake.




Requisiti:




laurea ad indirizzo STEM
conoscenze approfondite in ambito analisi di dati, machine learning e intelligenza artificiale
competenze approfondite in ambito database relazionali/non relazionali/data lake
conoscenze statistiche di modellizzazione ed esplorazione dati, campionamento, serie temporali e analisi bayesiana
competenze in ambito di tecniche e tool di rappresentazione dei dati
competenze in ambito di programmazione / scripting




Costituiranno un plus:

Certificazioni PMP, PRINCE2.
Certificazioni SAS (programmazione base, avanzata, ML)




Tecnologie:




Pacchetto MS Office (Excel, Word, Powerpoint))
Software BI e visualizzazione dati (SAS, Power BI, Tableau, FineReport)
Linguaggi di programmazione in ambito Analytics e Data Science (SAS, SQL, , Python, R)
Relational Databases (MS SQL Server, Oracle, Mariadb)
Non Relational Databases (MongoDB, Cassandra, Redis, , Elastic Search, Splunk)




Soft Skill:




Capacit√† eccellente di comunicazione.
Competenza nella gestione delle priorit√†, delle tempistiche e nel problem-solving.
Forte orientamento al teamwork e capacit√† di adattamento alle differenti situazioni progettuali.
Forti capacit√† di gestione delle relazioni
Orientamento alla qualit√† del lavoro svolto
Capacit√† di gestione del Cliente e orientamento agli obiettivi aziendali
Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese













Sede di lavoro: Milano

Sono possibili brevi trasferte presso le altre sedi del Cliente e del Gruppo




Per candidarsi inviare il CV con autorizzazione al trattamento dei dati a curriculum@alfagroup.it indicando nell‚Äôoggetto ‚ÄúData Scientist‚Äù.




Il presente annuncio √® rivolto ad entrambi i sessi, ai sensi delle leggi 903/77 e 125/91, e a persone di tutte le et√† e tutte le nazionalit√†, ai sensi dei decreti legislativi 215/03 e 216/03.




I dati personali saranno trattati in conformit√† al Regolamento UE 2016/679 e successive integrazioni; gli interessati possono consultare l‚ÄôInformativa sul trattamento dei dati personali sul sito www.alfagroup.it

Il presente annuncio √® rivolto ad entrambi i sessi, ai sensi delle leggi 903/77 e 125/91, e a persone di tutte le et√† e tutte le nazionalit√†, ai sensi dei decreti legislativi 215/03 e 216/03.


I dati personali saranno trattati in conformit√† al Regolamento UE 2016/679 e successive integrazioni; gli interessati possono consultare l‚ÄôInformativa sul trattamento dei dati personali sul sito www.alfagroup.it

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Got the drive to shape the future of insurance?

At Prima, you could take on a whole new challenge. As part of our global community, you‚Äôd be in the driving seat of your career; learning and growing with a top-tier team around you. Prima is a place where no matter who you are or what your role is ‚Äî your voice is valued.

Back in 2015, we embarked on a mission: to provide great value car insurance that is designed for everyone. And we‚Äôve come a long way, we‚Äôve created a culture where we can fuel each other‚Äôs success. But we need your expertise, as we steer things in a new and exciting direction.

You‚Äôre probably thinking‚Ä¶ ‚ÄòThat sounds pretty good‚Äô. We agree.

As well as great colleagues and engaging projects, there are loads of ways we can help you do the best work of your life. We‚Äôve shaped our offering to place a focus on wellbeing, autonomy and development. We see benefits as the fuel that will empower you to succeed, if you decide to embark on this journey with us.

Step into the spotlight at Prima in the Pricing team and play a pivotal role in making Prima the most successful insurance company in the world. With the power of creativity, data and machine learning, you'll be at the forefront of our competitive advantage: predict the future and set prices accordingly.

ü§∏üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Working in a way that works for you

We believe in work-life balance and flexibility. Whether you like working from the office, home or a mixture of both. We‚Äôll help you find a balance that works best for you. We even have a policy that means you can work from any location for 30 days a year. We trust you to steer us forward.

üèÅ The freedom to explore the possibilities

We may move fast at Prima, but we move together. We‚Äôre invested in your growth; so we‚Äôll give you access to a teaching and learning marketplace. And you‚Äôll have regular sessions with your manager to establish a personal growth plan.

üåà Our winning formula: happy and high-performing

From private medical insurance to discounted gym memberships and wellbeing initiatives: we‚Äôre here to support you. We know how important your health and well-being is, so we‚Äôll go the extra mile to help you when we can.

If it sounds like we‚Äôve got something that‚Äôs up your street, let‚Äôs see if you‚Äôve got the skills we‚Äôre looking for!

Step into the spotlight at Prima as a Data Scientist of the Pricing team and play a pivotal role in making Prima the most successful insurance company in the world. With the power of creativity, data and machine learning, you'll be at the forefront of our competitive advantage: predict the future and set prices accordingly.

As a Data Scientist at Prima, your role is crucial in leveraging the power of artificial intelligence and advanced data analytics to decode the risks and opportunities presented by each new client. Your work directly influences our company's growth and long-term success, contributing to the achievement of our strategic goals.

Are you the ideal candidate for this exciting role? Here's what we're looking for:


Academic Excellence : Impressive academic achievements in Mathematics, Physics, Engineering Mathematics, Engineering Physics, or Statistics are a plus.
Experience Not Required : No prior work experience? No problem! We're eager to invest in your talent and education.
Analytical Prowess : Strong quantitative, logical, and analytical skills are essential. At Prima, you'll tackle diverse and stimulating challenges that will put your skills to the test.
Curiosity and Innovation : We value curiosity, proactivity, and pragmatism. You'll be encouraged to pursue common goals in original and innovative ways, shaping the future with your ideas.


We're Also Interested In Candidates Who


Have international experience and are fluent in English and Italian.
Possess a solid foundation in programming and machine learning.
Know how to create and manipulate datasets using data mining languages like MySQL or Redshift.


Research shows that some people are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single criteria. At Prima we are committed to building diverse teams so please apply even if your past experience doesn‚Äôt align perfectly with the requirements. You might still be a great fit!

If you're curious about experiencing a day in the life of a Data Scientist, take a look at this video from our Head of Pricing & Underwriting Italy.

Prima is a community made up of talented and ambitious individuals. We offer equal employment opportunities and are oriented towards diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination of any kind based on race, colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, nationality, disability, genetic information, pregnancy or other protected personal characteristics, as defined by national laws.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Are you a brilliant new graduate, passionate about Big Data and Machine Learning? Do you think Artificial Intelligence is changing the world with groundbreaking innovation? Dive into Deep Learning algorithms and cutting-edge techniques to develop human-machine interaction.

Join Reply!




WHAT WE OFFER

A technological nirvana. At Reply, true innovation runs in our blood. We have a nerdy heart and we are proud of it. Cool tech stack, guaranteed hands-on experience, challenges, hackathons, table footballs and free coffee are already waiting for you.
A continuous learning experience. In Reply, what you know is never enough. Choose from internal webinars, learn from other Replyers and teach others what keeps you awake at night.
A structured career. The perfect path to your achievements. Now with a brand new Graduate Programme.




WHAT WE NEED

Academic background. With a brilliant Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science or technical equivalent.
Teamwork mindset. In Reply, we believe in teamwork. Once here, your team will be your family and will guide you everywhere. We hope you will love it.
Curiosity and drive. We ask you to love what you do. And to always aim for excellence.




WHO WE ARE

Reply is a company that specialises in Consulting, Systems Integration and Digital Services with a focus on the conception, design and implementation of solutions based on the new communication channels and digital media. Reply partners with key industrial groups in defining and developing business models made possible by the new technological and communication paradigms such as Artificial Intelligence, Big Data, Cloud Computing, Digital Communication, the Internet of Things and Mobile and Social Networking.

Feel interested?

Title: AI Specialist
Description:
Mollo tutto e vado lavorare in banca.

Lo avresti mai detto prima?

Siamo la neobank italiana con sede a Milano ‚Äì Biella ‚Äì Torino che dal 2015 reinterpreta il mondo del banking tradizionale in modo accessibile, contemporaneo e intuitivo.

Abbiamo costruito un‚Äôapp per rispondere con semplicit√† e immediatezza ai bisogni finanziari di chiunque, ogni giorno.

Oggi, con pi√π di 1.9 milioni di clienti, siamo la neobank leader sul mercato italiano.

Siamo alla ricerca di un/una AI Specialist

Quali saranno le tue responsabilit√†

Progettare e sviluppare modelli di AI e le strutture/servizi per la fruizione del loro output
Validare e testare i modelli sviluppati
Realizzare processing di dati strutturati/non-strutturati
Contribuire alla definizione e all‚Äôimplementazione di standard per la gestione dei modelli e relativa documentazione

Sei la persona ideale se hai‚Ä¶

Laurea in Informatica
Almeno 1 anno di esperienza nel ruolo
Conoscenza del linguaggio Python
Dimestichezza con il linguaggio SQL ed esperienza con database relazionali
Esperienza con tool di versioning del codice (Git)
Conoscenza degli algoritmi di Machine Learning / Deep Learning e dei relativi framework di sviluppo modelli (come Scipy, scikit-learn, Keras, Pytorch, Tensorflow)
Conoscenza del ciclo di vita dei modelli (MLOps)
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese (scritta e parlata)
Esperienza con framework per la gestione di Big Data (Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Databricks) e con LLM (OpenAI, HuggingFace), pubblicazioni scientifiche e progetti personali / contribuzioni a progetti open-source costituiranno titolo preferenziale.




Cosa troverai

ü´∂ Farai parte di un contesto giovane, con un‚Äôet√† media di 35 anni, aperto e inclusivo, che ama dare alle persone la possibilit√† di partecipare ad iniziative sociali e di volontariato, a tornei sportivi ed eventi spettacolari. Crediamo fermamente nei nostri valori, visita il nostro sito per scoprirli.

üéÅ Riceverai un welcome kit con dei super gadget brandizzati HYPE

ü§åüèº Potrai scegliere in quale delle nostre tre sedi lavorare tra l‚ÄôHQ di Milano, Biella o Torino

ü©∫ Avrai a tua disposizione una Polizza Sanitaria gratuita (con possibilit√† di estensione ai propri famigliari) e una Polizza Vita gratuita

üåé Riceverai un credito Welfare da spendere per bollette, viaggi, spese mediche, corsi di formazione, palestra, gift card, scuole, attivit√† sportive e ricreative per bambini e molto altro

‚úÇÔ∏è Avrai accesso ad un sito pieno di convenzioni e sconti su tantissimi brand

‚õ∫ Potrai decidere di lavorare in Smart Working fino all‚Äô80% dell‚Äôanno

üéì Avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† di accedere a piattaforme di formazione per la tua continua crescita professionale e personale

üìùAvrai un contratto che rientra nel CCNL del Settore Creditizio e Finanziario




La nostra azienda √® fermamente impegnata a promuovere un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo e rispettoso, in linea con i principi dell'etica e correttezze. Crediamo nella diversit√† come valore fondamentale e ci impegniamo a garantire pari opportunit√† a tutti i candidati, indipendentemente da qualsiasi caratteristica.




Sei una persona curiosa, entusiasta e hai voglia di lanciarti in una nuova avventura? In questo caso HYPE √® il posto giusto per te. Unisciti al team!

Title: Junior AI Engineer
Description:
Excellence Innovation da pi√π di 10 anni progetta e realizza software specialistici e proprietari per il settore finanziario italiano e rappresenta uno dei pi√π significativi casi di successo di boutique che in breve tempo √® riuscita a crescere ed affermarsi nel settore dei professional services.

Per la nostra sede di Milano siamo alla ricerca di un Junior GenAI Engineer per rafforzare il nostro team di AI e Data Analytics.




Cosa farai?

Progettazione e realizzazione: Supporterai il team nella progettazione funzionale, logica e tecnica, e nella realizzazione di progetti che integrano modelli di Generative AI, tecniche di Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) e Agenti AI, sia su nuove iniziative che per integrare e potenziare i prodotti proprietari di Excellence Innovation.
Valutazione delle performance: Parteciperai alla definizione delle logiche di pipeline di monitoraggio delle performance dei modelli LLM ed alla loro attivazione, per valutare l‚Äôefficacia e la coerenza dei risultati attesi.
Ricerca e Iterazione: Contribuirai alle fasi di ricerca e sviluppo, sperimentando soluzioni che includano differenti modelli e framework in costante evoluzione, per supportare le scelte progettuali e di prodotto.




Quali obiettivi ci poniamo come azienda?

Farti crescere nel ruolo e nelle responsabilit√† individuali assieme all‚Äôazienda;
Farti lavorare su progetti concreti e di valore, lasciando spazio a idee e proposte per potenziare e innovare i prodotti di Excellence;
Darti flessibilit√† organizzativa e responsabilit√† individuale crescente;
Sviluppare un piano di competenze individuale che tenga conto delle tue caratteristiche, preferenze e passioni, e degli obiettivi di crescita professionale.




Chi ricerchiamo?

Laureandi e laureati in Ingegneria Informatica, Gestionale o discipline affini.
Forte interesse per l‚ÄôAI generativa, RAG e Agenti AI (sono valorizzati anche progetti accademici o personali).
Approccio proattivo nella ricerca e nell‚Äôaggiornamento su nuove tecnologie e metodologie.
Attitudine a lavorare in team multidisciplinari, con capacit√† di comunicare efficacemente con persone di competenze diverse.
Una personalit√† aperta e positiva.




Sono preferenziali:

Conoscenza di Python e familiarit√† con alcuni framework (ad es. LangChain, Autogen)
Conoscenza di sistemi di workflow automation compatibili con Ai




Perch√© Gruppo Excellence?




Farai parte della nostra crescita

Sarai coinvolto/a in progetti strategici e innovativi per lo sviluppo del business aziendale e potrai lavorare direttamente con il Top Management delle aziende cliente. Chi entrer√† a fare parte della nostra squadra trover√† un ambiente di lavoro giovane, smart, proattivo e stimolante e avr√† la possibilit√† di lavorare nell‚Äôambito di progetti dinamici per aziende leader nei mercati di riferimento.

Svilupperai il tuo potenziale

Avrai accesso alla nostra piattaforma di formazione Excellence Academy, con un catalogo sempre aggiornato di corsi su hard e soft skills che accresceranno le tue competenze su numerose tematiche.

Premiamo il merito e il talento, anche attraverso un percorso di carriera personalizzato: ti daremo la possibilit√† di realizzare aspirazioni personali in linea con gli obiettivi aziendali.

Siamo un‚Äôorganizzazione orizzontale in cui la voce di ciascuno viene accolta e valorizzata! Ci impegniamo a promuovere e a tutelare il valore delle nostre persone, necessarie e fondamentali per lo sviluppo del knowledge aziendale.

Avrai un ottimo work-life balance

Troverai una policy che supporta il lavoro flessibile e la possibilit√† di lavorare da casa quando necessario. Ti riserviamo un piano welfare per acquisto abbonamenti mezzi pubblici, buoni spesa, corsi, ingressi cinema, abbonamenti palestre, viaggi e molto altro.

Lavorerai in un ambiente inclusivo ed equo

Valorizziamo la diversit√†, l‚Äôunicit√† e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutte le nostre persone abbiano pari opportunit√† lavorative.




Abbiamo scelto di certificarci ISO 9001, UNI PdR 125:2022 e Carbon Net Company.




Il nostro processo di selezione √® meritocratico e lontano da qualsivoglia forma di discriminazione diretta o indiretta, nel rispetto dei migliori standard internazionali e delle leggi applicabili (inclusi ma non limitati alla L. 903/77).

Siamo un‚Äôorganizzazione orizzontale in cui la voce di ciascuno viene accolta e valorizzata! Ci impegniamo a promuovere e a tutelare il valore delle nostre persone, necessarie e fondamentali per lo sviluppo del knowledge aziendale.

  • Avrai un ottimo work-life balance

Troverai una policy che supporta il lavoro flessibile e la possibilit√† di lavorare da casa quando necessario. Ti riserviamo un piano welfare per acquisto abbonamenti mezzi pubblici, buoni spesa, corsi, ingressi cinema, abbonamenti palestre, viaggi e molto altro.

  • Lavorerai in un ambiente inclusivo ed equo

Valorizziamo la diversit√†, l‚Äôunicit√† e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutte le nostre persone abbiano pari opportunit√† lavorative.


Abbiamo scelto di certificarci ISO 9001, UNI PdR 125:2022 e Carbon Net Company.


Il nostro processo di selezione √® meritocratico e lontano da qualsivoglia forma di discriminazione diretta o indiretta, nel rispetto dei migliori standard internazionali e delle leggi applicabili (inclusi ma non limitati alla L. 903/77).

Title: Data Scientist Manager
Description:
The Company

KIKO MILANO was founded in 1997 in Milan and since then has revolutionized how cosmetics are sold globally. We thrive to offer an incredible variety of products, textures & colours, a multi-sensorial experience in innovative technology yet always at an affordable price. Based in Italy, and truthful to its DNA, KIKO MILANO takes advantage of combining trustworthy quality, creativity and stunning aesthetics







Your role at KIKO MILANO

We are looking for a Data Scientist Manager to join KIKO MILANO‚Äôs Data Analytics and Insights team.




Such talent will will bridge business strategy and AI-driven solutions, working closely with executives to translate challenges into data-driven opportunities. You will lead analytics projects, oversee AI model deployment, and mentor data scientists while driving innovation and operational efficiency.




In particular, you will:




Work executives to understand business problems and map them to state-of-the-art analytics and AI solutions
Help think strategically about how to leverage technology to create fundamental business impact, from formulating tech-driven growth strategies to enabling more efficient operations through the use of technology
Develop and lead AI and advanced analytics roadmaps, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
Help lead digital and analytics projects that include the development and deployment of AI technologies and models
Establish best practices, ensuring high standards in modeling, experimentation, and AI deployment.
Play an active role in all aspects of a project, typically working in teams including business stakeholders and technical stakeholders (e.g., data scientists, data engineers); this will include gathering and analyzing information, formulating and testing hypotheses, and developing and communicating recommendations for the business
Mentor data scientists, fostering technical excellence, innovation, and a data-driven mindset within the team to maximize their impact on the business.







What you will need to succeed

Advanced degree, preferably an MBA or PhD in a relevant field (such as computer science, machine learning, applied statistics, mathematics)
5+ years of work experience after completing your undergraduate degree, with strong functional knowledge and hands-on experience in data analytics and cloud data systems and platforms
Proficient in at least one relevant coding language required (e.g., Python, etc.)
Experience of working with large data sets, simulation/ optimization and distributed computing tools (Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, etc.) is a plus
Experience in machine learning, statistics, optimization or related fields, understands underlying methodologies and algorithms
Experience in people management
Combination of strategic and analytical insights with a passion for technology
Experience in applying data science methods to business problems
Good presentation and communication skills with a knack for explaining complex analytical concepts to people from other fields
Skills to communicate complex ideas effectively in English







We would love if you had

Strong organizational skills with an ability to re-prioritize tasks as required to meet deadlines, rigorous, well organized, ability to coordinate multiples activities with many stakeholders
Experience working in a fast-paced environment
Team player




KIKO si impegna ad ampliare i propri sforzi per garantire le Pari Opportunit√† e dedica una particolare attenzione all‚Äôintegrazione delle persone con disabilit√† all‚Äôinterno dell‚Äôazienda. Tutte le posizioni aperte in KIKO sono rivolte anche ai candidati appartenenti alle Categorie Protette l.68/99. I dati verranno trattati esclusivamente ai fini di Ricerca del Personale. Leggi l'informativa privacy riportata al link https://static.kikocosmetics.com/public/HR/PrivacyCandidati.pdf

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Job description:

Siamo alla ricerca di un Data Scientist da inserire nel nostro team Data Management, che riporter√† direttamente al Chief Data Officer.

¬†

Requisiti

3 - 5 anni di esperienza nel ruolo
Laurea magistrale in ambito quantitativo (informatica, fisica, matematica, ingegneria ecc.) o corsi post-laurea equivalenti
Conoscenza avanzata di almeno un linguaggio di programmazione/interrogazione dati (Python, R, SQL‚Ä¶)
Comprovata esperienza nella risoluzione di problemi aziendali mediante analisi avanzate e di rigore statistico
Ottime capacit√† di comunicazione e di veicolare risultati di analisi complesse in modo chiaro a tutti i livelli di stakeholder
Attitudine a lavorare in team, a costruire relazioni e alla gestione degli stakeholder
Ottime capacit√† organizzative, attenzione ai dettagli e ragionamento analitico
L'esperienza con Google Analytics √® un plus

¬†

Principali attivit√†

Fornire una guida di pensiero sul ciclo completo di raccolta, controllo, pulizia e utilizzo dei nostri dati
Sviluppare metriche, dashboard, report e approfondimenti per aiutare Telepass a creare prodotti e campagne di marketing che soddisfino le esigenze dei clienti
Creare e gestire asset di dati (tabelle, report, strumenti di visualizzazione dei dati...) per contribuire a rafforzare l'impatto del processo decisionale basato sui dati all‚Äôinterno del Gruppo
Sviluppare relazioni con altri team di analisi, data science e business all'interno dell'azienda
Sviluppare¬†modelli di AI/ML a supporto del business e delle decisioni aziendali

¬†

La sede di lavoro √® Milano¬†(ibrido)¬†

Title: Data Scientist - Global Teams
Description:
Got the drive to shape the future of insurance?

At Prima, you could take on a whole new challenge. As part of our global community, you‚Äôd be in the driving seat of your career; learning and growing with a top-tier team around you. Prima is a place where no matter who you are or what your role is ‚Äî your voice is valued.

Back in 2015, we embarked on a mission: to provide great value car insurance that is designed for everyone. And we‚Äôve come a long way, we‚Äôve created a culture where we can fuel each other‚Äôs success. But we need your expertise, as we steer things in a new and exciting direction.

You‚Äôre probably thinking‚Ä¶ ‚ÄòThat sounds pretty good‚Äô. We agree.

As well as great colleagues and engaging projects, there are loads of ways we can help you do the best work of your life. We‚Äôve shaped our offering to place a focus on well-being, autonomy and development. We see benefits as the fuel that will empower you to succeed, if you decide to embark on this journey with us.

ü§∏üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Working in a way that works for you

We believe in work-life balance and flexibility. Whether you like working from the office, home or a mixture of both. We‚Äôll help you find a balance that works best for you. We even have a policy that means you can work from any location for 30 days a year. We trust you to steer us forward.

üèÅ The freedom to explore the possibilities

We may move fast at Prima, but we move together. We‚Äôre invested in your growth; so we‚Äôll give you access to a teaching and learning marketplace. And you‚Äôll have regular sessions with your manager to establish a personal growth plan.

üåà Our winning formula: happy and high-performing

From private medical insurance to discounted gym memberships and wellbeing initiatives: we‚Äôre here to support you. We know how important your health and well-being is, so we‚Äôll go the extra mile to help you when we can.

If it sounds like we‚Äôve got something that‚Äôs up your street, let‚Äôs see if you‚Äôve got the skills we‚Äôre looking for!

At Prima, Data Scientists are part of the Pricing & Underwriting department , working within global teams that drive our international strategy. By applying for this role, you'll be considered for one of two global teams, and during the hiring process, we'll determine the best fit for your skills and expertise.

Our Global Pricing & Underwriting Teams are at the forefront of shaping our international strategy through data, analytics, and innovation. They transform complexity into structured, proactive solutions, enabling each market to identify opportunities for improvement and drive continuous growth.

By combining strategic vision with cutting-edge analytics, the team ensures a seamless approach to pricing and underwriting. Their work spans from defining and executing global strategies to developing advanced machine learning models and optimizing data pipelines. Through collaboration across multiple markets, they extract insights, identify scalable best practices, and enhance technical capabilities, making data-driven decision-making a core strength of Prima.

This unified approach empowers us to stay ahead in a dynamic industry, leveraging data and expertise to drive innovation, efficiency, and sustainable success. üöÄ

Join us and be part of a global team pushing the boundaries of Pricing & Underwriting through data.

As a Data Scientist in these teams, some of your activities could be:


Design, build and evolve Prima‚Äôs proprietary predictive technology, in topics such as the prediction of future claims, tactical pricing, renewal probability, fraud detection and customer lifetime value, etc;
Define and support the implementation in each country of the key tools to understand how the business is growing, for example, conversion, retention, emerging profitability. The monitoring tools need to be consistent at a global level and at the same time able to adapt to the different stages of evolution of each country;
Support the countries in planning the pricing and UW strategy and consequent follow up;
Develop a strong critical spirit and creativity that can act as an engine for Prima's growth.


Are you the ideal candidate for this exciting role? Here's what we're looking for:


Impressive academic achievements in Mathematics, Computer science, Physics, Statistics, Mathematical Engineering or Physical Engineering;
From graduates to people with 2+ years of working/research experience: we‚Äôre open to evaluate the seniority during the recruitment process;
Strong Python programming skills - especially in the data domain - and fluent use of GIT;
Excellent English level, oral & written;
You have a genuine, collaborative mindset that inspires and guides others.


In addition to the basic requirements, we will carefully evaluate these characteristics as a plus:


You have previous work experience in similar roles;
Knowledge of Spark, SQL or any other data-oriented programming language and proficiency with standard data wrangling and modeling libraries (Pandas, Sklearn. Keras, XGBboost, LightGBM, etc.);
Knowledge of BI tools (Tableau or similar);
Strong background in mathematical optimization, linear and nonlinear programming, convex optimization, combinatorial optimization techniques, metaheuristics (such as genetic algorithms, simulated annealing, and particle swarm optimization), and stochastic optimization methods.


Remember, research shows that some people are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single criteria. At Prima we are committed to building diverse teams so please apply even if your past experience doesn‚Äôt align perfectly with the requirements. You might still be a great fit!

Prima is a community made up of talented and ambitious individuals. We offer equal employment opportunities and are oriented towards diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination of any kind based on race, colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, nationality, disability, genetic information, pregnancy or other protected personal characteristics, as defined by national laws.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Unisciti a INAZ, il gruppo italiano leader nel settore HR Tech!

Siamo alla ricerca di colleghi e colleghe per la posizione di Data Scientist da inserire nel team di Ricerca e Sviluppo dedicato all‚ÄôAi.

Cosa facciamo?

Sviluppiamo soluzioni innovative per la gestione delle hr, utilizzando la tecnologia e l‚ÄôAI per trasformare i dati in valore. Se sei un/una appassionato/a di analisi dei dati, machine learning e intelligenza artificiale, potresti essere la persona che stiamo cercando. Candidati oggi stesso e aiuta a plasmare il futuro dell‚ÄôHR Tech con noi!

#Inazpeople

Title: Data Scientist, Italy - BCG X
Description:
Who We Are

Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact.

To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures‚Äîand business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive.

We Are BCG X

We‚Äôre a diverse team of more than 3,000 tech experts united by a drive to make a difference. Working across industries and disciplines, we combine our experience and expertise to tackle the biggest challenges faced by society today. We go beyond what was once thought possible, creating new and innovative solutions to the world‚Äôs most complex problems. Leveraging BCG‚Äôs global network and partnerships with leading organizations, BCG X provides a stable ecosystem for talent to build game-changing businesses, products, and services from the ground up, all while growing their career. Together, we strive to create solutions that will positively impact the lives of millions.

What You'll Do

Our BCG X teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing new business challenges, designing innovative algorithms, implementing, and deploying scalable solutions, and enabling colleagues and clients to fully embrace AI. Our product offerings span from fully custom-builds to industry specific leading edge AI software solutions.

Our Data Scientists and Senior Data Scientist are part of our rapidly growing team to apply data science methods and analytics to real-world business situations across industries to drive significant business impact. You'll have the chance to partner with clients in a variety of BCG regions and industries, and on key topics like climate change, enabling them to design, build, and deploy new and innovative solutions.

Additional responsibilities will include developing and delivering thought leadership in scientific communities and papers as well as leading conferences on behalf of BCG X. Successful candidates are intellectually curious builders who are biased toward action, creative, and communicative.

We Are Looking For Dedicated Individuals With a Passion For Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research And Redefining Organizations Into AI Led Innovative Companies. Successful Candidates Possess The Following


Comfortable in a client-facing role with the ambition to lead teams
Likes to distill complex results or processes into simple, clear visualizations
Explain sophisticated data science concepts in an understandable manner
Love building things and are comfortable working with modern development tools and writing code collaboratively (bonus points if you have a software development or DevOps experience)
Significant experience applying advanced analytics to a variety of business situations and a proven ability to synthesize complex data
Deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical underpinnings, and can translate this into business implications for our clients
Have strong project management skills
Fluency in both Italian and English


#BCGXjob

What You'll Bring

Requirements

Master‚Äôs or PhD degree program in Computer Research Science, Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research, or related field

Technologies


Programming: Python


#BCGXjob

Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.

BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

Title: DATA SCIENTIST
Description:
Chi cerchiamo

Per la nostra sede di Milano siamo alla ricerca di una persona da inserire come Data Scientist all‚Äôinterno della struttura Data Science Office. La struttura ha tra le principali responsabilit√† quella di supportare a livello di Gruppo l‚Äôindividuazione di utilizzi dei dati per estrarne il maggior valore possibile e supportare le unit√† locali nel Business nello sviluppo di use cases, nella realizzazione e nel miglioramento delle soluzioni di Advanced Analytics, anche promuovendo la diffusione di best-practice, standard e know-how.

Per quale societ√†

A2A S.p.A.

Ti occuperai di


Esplorazione e analisi di elevate moli di dati al fine di supportare l‚Äôelaborazione delle soluzioni di Advanced Analytics
Applicazione di tecniche statistiche avanzate, machine learning supervisionato e non supervisionato, Deep Learning, Data Mining (analisi time series, alberi decisionali, algoritmi di clusterizzazione come K-mean, random forest, reti neurali‚Ä¶) e tecniche di Intelligenza Artificiale Generativa
Collaborazione attiva con il team per supportare e implementare la messa in produzione dei progetti
Partecipazione proattiva all‚Äôinnovazione e all‚Äôottimizzazione dei processi aziendali


Sei la persona giusta se ti riconosci in questo profilo


Laurea Magistrale in Data Science, Statistica, Matematica, Fisica, Ingegneria, Informatica
Esperienza di almeno 2 anni in ambito di tecniche di Advanced Analytics, modellazione e analisi statistica di elevate moli di dati
Consolidata esperienza nella gestione di database e data warehouse su larga scala (SQL/NoSQL), e l‚Äôutilizzo di tecnologie Big Data (Spark, ...)
Conoscenza avanzata di Python e delle librerie di Machine Learning
Conoscenza dei Cloud Provider Google (GCP), Amazon (AWS) e Microsoft (Azure)
Rappresenta un requisito fondamentale pregressa esperienza in data visualization: Microsoft Power BI, Django, Flask, Dash, Shiny
Rappresenta un requisito fondamentale esperienza o conoscenza di tecniche avanzate di Machine Learning supervisionato e non supervisionato, Deep Learning, Data Mining e Generative AI
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese
Completano il profilo: forte orientamento al team working e capacit√† di interfacciarsi con interlocutori a diversi livelli, pensiero critico e capacit√† di problem solving, attitudine a lavorare in un ambiente dinamico, collaborativo con organizzazione agile (startuplike)


Che cosa offriamo


Flessibilit√†: settimana lavorativa con venerd√¨ a orario ridotto; flessibilit√† negli orari di entrata/uscita e pausa pranzo; 60% di smartworking su base bimestrale
Buoni pasto elettronici
Salute e benessere:¬†assistenza sanitaria integrativa,¬†supporto psicologico attraverso counseling, webinar dedicati al benessere psicofisico e vaccino antinfluenzale
Famiglia: A2A Life Caring, iniziativa a supporto della genitorialit√† attraverso un mese aggiuntivo retribuito al 100% per maternit√†/paternit√†, rimborsi spese per figli, convenzioni con asili nido, team coaching per neogenitori; spazio caregiver,¬†offriamo webinar e uno spazio di ascolto dedicati a chi si prende cura di persone fragili o non autosufficienti
Formazione e sviluppo: programma di induction dedicato ai nuovi assunti,¬†gestione dei talenti, corsi di formazione e possibilit√† di crescita interna e job rotation tramite candidatura interna
Risparmio e tempo libero: oltre 300 convenzioni, tra cui trasporti pubblici, attivit√† sportive, viaggi, eventi culturali, e offerte speciali per luce e gas. Opzioni per il car sharing e la conversione del premio di risultato in benefit di welfare
Ambiente di lavoro:¬†promuoviamo una cultura che valorizza la diversit√†, l‚Äôequit√† e l'inclusione (DE&I); potrai inoltre avere la possibilit√† di unirti a un team dedicato allo sviluppo di iniziative e progetti su queste tematiche. Sosteniamo l'evoluzione tecnologica e offriamo strumenti e risorse per promuovere il lavoro digitale


Saranno valutate esclusivamente le candidature inviate tramite il Sito Carriere aziendale.

Ci impegniamo ogni giorno per creare un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo e innovativo, fondato sul rispetto, sull‚Äôetica e sulle pari opportunit√† garantendo la valorizzazione delle diversit√†.¬†
La selezione √® rivolta a candidati e candidate in linea con le competenze richieste. I dati personali raccolti verranno trattati nel rispetto del Regolamento Ue 2016/679 (GDPR).

Title: Junior Data Scientist
Description:
A.B.S. √® alla ricerca di un Junior Data Scientist per ampliare il team di Milano!

Sei la persona giusta? Leggi l‚Äôannuncio e aiutaci a conoscerti inviandoci il tuo curriculum.

Il contesto di cui farai parte

A.B.S. (Advanced Business Solutions), nata nel gennaio 2000, si propone al mercato come uno dei pi√π importanti partner di qualit√† per le grandi aziende in ambito ERP Oracle.

Partener Oracle da sempre, A.B.S. accompagna le aziende nella loro trasformazione digitale e su sviluppi web innovativi gestiti in logica agile.

√à recentemente entrata in Altea Federation portando in dote il suo expertise sul mondo Oracle e sull‚Äôintero ciclo di vita dello sviluppo del software a livello enterprise.

3 cose che devi sapere in 3 hashtag

#DataEngineeringDataScience

L‚Äôattivit√† prevede lo studio e lo sviluppo di soluzioni legati al data science e al data engineering, partendo dalle pipeline dei dati fino ai servizi di reportistica. Il lavoro √® in modalit√† ibrida. Come membro del Team Solutions, avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† e la responsabilit√† di formarti sullo sviluppo in cloud, sul data science e il data engineering, lavorare su progetti nell‚Äôambito del data engineering e il data science, partecipare allo sviluppo interno del team data science con idee e poc.

#Holonicmantra

La nostra company fa parte del Gruppo Altea Federation. Diventerai un A-People e svolgerai la tua attivit√† a contatto con le altre FedCo. Ti confronterai con professionisti di diversi ambiti e condividerai con loro progetti ed esperienze professionali.

Se cerchi un ambiente dinamico e in continuo becoming‚Ä¶ here we are üòä

#Human

Altea Federation √® una realt√† aziendale Covey compliant, Secondo Stephen Covey, uno dei pi√π importanti studiosi a livello mondiale delle tematiche dell‚Äôefficacia e della crescita personale, sono 7 le abitudini (#7 Habits) che distinguono le persone altamente efficaci.

In altre parole, assertivit√†, empatia, team working, capacit√† di costruire relazioni. Gestirai situazioni complesse e ti interfaccerai con molteplici attori.

Le tue abilit√† relazionali faranno la differenza nel raggiungimento degli obiettivi.

Sei La Persona Che Fa Per Noi Se


Hai una Laurea in discipline scientifiche
Hai un mindset digitale, un forte orientamento all‚Äôinnovazione e un approccio consulenziale
Hai conoscenza ed esperienza formativa in almeno un linguaggio di programmazione (preferibilmente Python)
Interesse nell‚Äôambito dati e machine learning
Hai una conoscenza di base di database relazionali e SQL
Hai una conoscenza di concetti base di machine learning e calcolo distribuito
Hai un‚Äôottima conoscenza della lingua inglese (scritta e parlata)


AlteaFederation Sostiene Ed Incoraggia Le Differenze, a Vantaggio Della Nostra Comunit√† Di A-people e Di Tutte Le Company Della Federation. Siamo Orgogliosamente Per La Non Discriminazione e Per Le Pari Opportunit√† e Crediamo Nel Rispetto Di Tutte Le Leggi Applicabili In Materia. Se Hai Una Disabilit√† o Una Necessit√† Speciale, Non Esitare a Candidarti, per noi ogni differenza √® una ricchezza!

Entra nella nostra squadra e scrivi la tua storia in Altea Federation!

Come membro del Team Solutions, avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† e la responsabilit√† di formarti sullo sviluppo in cloud, sul data science e il data engineering, lavorare su progetti nell‚Äôambito del data engineering e il data science, partecipare allo sviluppo interno del team data science con idee e poc.

#Holonicmantra

La nostra company fa parte del Gruppo Altea Federation. Diventerai un A-People e svolgerai la tua attivit√† a contatto con le altre FedCo. Ti confronterai con professionisti di diversi ambiti e condividerai con loro progetti ed esperienze professionali.

Se cerchi un ambiente dinamico e in continuo becoming‚Ä¶ here we are üòä

#Human

Altea Federation √® una realt√† aziendale Covey compliant, Secondo Stephen Covey, uno dei pi√π importanti studiosi a livello mondiale delle tematiche dell‚Äôefficacia e della crescita personale, sono 7 le abitudini (#7 Habits) che distinguono le persone altamente efficaci.

In altre parole, assertivit√†, empatia, team working, capacit√† di costruire relazioni. Gestirai situazioni complesse e ti interfaccerai con molteplici attori.

Le tue abilit√† relazionali faranno la differenza nel raggiungimento degli obiettivi.

Sei La Persona Che Fa Per Noi Se

  • Hai una Laurea in discipline scientifiche
  • Hai un mindset digitale, un forte orientamento all‚Äôinnovazione e un approccio consulenziale
  • Hai conoscenza ed esperienza formativa in almeno un linguaggio di programmazione (preferibilmente Python)
  • Interesse nell‚Äôambito dati e machine learning
  • Hai una conoscenza di base di database relazionali e SQL
  • Hai una conoscenza di concetti base di machine learning e calcolo distribuito
  • Hai un‚Äôottima conoscenza della lingua inglese (scritta e parlata)

AlteaFederation Sostiene Ed Incoraggia Le Differenze, a Vantaggio Della Nostra Comunit√† Di A-people e Di Tutte Le Company Della Federation. Siamo Orgogliosamente Per La Non Discriminazione e Per Le Pari Opportunit√† e Crediamo Nel Rispetto Di Tutte Le Leggi Applicabili In Materia. Se Hai Una Disabilit√† o Una Necessit√† Speciale, Non Esitare a Candidarti, per noi ogni differenza √® una ricchezza!

Entra nella nostra squadra e scrivi la tua storia in Altea Federation!

Title: Data Scientist
HTML:
Descrizione lavoro:

Per rafforzare la funzione Data & Innovation e diventare una Data Driven Company, siamo alla ricerca di un* Data Scientist che sar√† responsabile di trasformare i dati in informazioni utili a supportare le decisioni aziendali strategiche. Il candidato ideale ha una solida esperienza nell'analisi dei dati e nella modellazione AI (machine learning, deep learning, etc.).

 

Responsabilit√†:

 

  • Definire e realizzare modelli di machine e deep learning da innestare nei processi operativi, gestionali e decisionali di AMCO
  • Analizzare grandi set di dati per identificare tendenze e modelli sintetizzando i risultati per il top management
  • Collaborare con team interfunzionali per comprendere le esigenze aziendali e tradurle in soluzioni basate su modelli supervised/unsupervised/reinforcement learning
  • Definire e realizzare dashboard per comunicare i risultati delle analisi ai principali stakeholder
  • Proporre con idee innovative modifiche per migliorare i processi e la qualit√† dei dati

Requisiti:

  • Laurea in Informatica, Matematica, Statistica (STEM)
  • Comprovata esperienza come Data Scientist o ruolo analoghi
  • Conoscenza approfondita di linguaggi di programmazione come Python, R, Pyspark o linguaggi similari
  • Esperienza con strumenti di visualizzazione dei dati (es. Tableau, Power BI).
  • Capacit√† di lavorare con database relazionali e non relazionali
  • Eccellenti capacit√† analitiche e di problem-solving
  • Buone capacit√† comunicative e attitudine al lavoro di squadra
Offriamo:

Cosa ti offriamo?

¬∑       Programmi di formazione personalizzati per favorire l‚Äôaggiornamento continuo e la crescita professionale;

¬∑       Valorizziamo il talento e lo premiamo: il piano di incentivazione MBO √® esteso a tutti i livelli professionali;

¬∑       Smart working fino a 10 giorni al mese, che potrai gestire con flessibilit√†;

¬∑       Buoni pasto, di valore superiore a quello di mercato, anche nei giorni di smart working;

¬∑       Abbiamo a cuore il tuo benessere: una polizza assicurativa sanitaria a copertura di spese mediche e infortunistiche e un programma di welfare per tutti i dipendenti;

¬∑       Per noi il tuo futuro √® importante: puoi aderire al nostro Fondo di previdenza complementare e beneficiare del contributo integrativo da parte dell‚Äôazienda, anche sulla retribuzione variabile;

¬∑       Borse di studio per i figli dei dipendenti;

¬∑       Abbiamo sposato strategie in ambito ESG e previsto la certificazione ambientale per tutti i nuovi uffici;

¬∑       PC portatile, telefono aziendale e connessione illimitata per tutti i nostri dipendenti;

¬∑       E ai neo-genitori nel 2025 regaliamo un ulteriore bonus!

¬∑       Possibilit√† di accedere a numerose convenzioni;

¬∑       Opportunit√† di partecipare ed essere protagonisti di numerose iniziative di engagement.

Title: AI & ML Engineer
Description:
Amplifon is an Italian multinational company and the global leader in hearing care solutions and services for retail expertise, customization, and consumer care. More than 20,300 professionals every day in a network more than 9,700 points of sale across 26 countries, give back the joy of hearing, feeling, and living to thousands of people across the world.

At Amplifon we believe people are the most important component of our success. Thanks to our best-in-class Hearing Care Professionals and front and back-office Teams, we are able to put the everyday taps, pops and splashes back into the lives of our customers. We believe that it‚Äôs only through strong investment in talent engagement, continuous professional development, support, and recognition that our people can exceed every limit and build a fulfilling career.

About the Role:

As an AI/Machine Learning Engineer, you will play a crucial role in developing and deploying AI solutions on our target AI platform. You will work closely with other team members to contribute to the evolution of our AI platform, define the best practices for AI development, and deliver impactful AI-driven solutions.

Responsibilities:


Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions.
Contribute to the development and maintenance of our AI platform, including infrastructure and tooling.
Experiment with and evaluate different machine learning algorithms and techniques to solve specific business problems.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
Follow best practices for AI development, including model versioning, data management, and code documentation.
Contribute to the definition and implementation of AI development best practices within the team.
Participate in code reviews and knowledge sharing sessions.
Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI/ML and related technologies.
Deploy and monitor AI models in production, ensuring performance and reliability.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to AI models and infrastructure.


Qualifications:


Master's degree in a scientific or engineering domain (e.g., Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Statistics, etc.).
Minimum of 3 years of hands-on experience in AI/Machine Learning engineering.
Proven experience with the Google Cloud Platform (GCP) suite, specifically Vertex AI, Storage, BigQuery, Cloud Functions, Cloud Scheduler, Cloud Composer.
Demonstrated experience in deploying AI use cases to production or significant experience in experimentation and model development lifecycle.
Strong programming skills in Python.
Experience with LangChain.
Solid understanding of machine learning concepts and algorithms.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work effectively in a global team environment. ¬†¬†


Bonus Points:


Experience with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Experience with MLOps tools and practices.
Experience with Dataiku
Google Cloud certifications
Familiarity with other cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure).


Amplifon is working on boosting a Winning Culture that will lead our employees towards the future, starting from the improvement of our Winning Workplace. Aligned to this goal, we offer a hybrid working policy, allowing employees to work 9 days/month remotely.¬†

Title: Machine Learning Scientist Intern
Description:
Integral Ad Science (IAS) is a global technology and data company that builds verification, optimization, and analytics solutions for the advertising industry and we‚Äôre looking for a Machine Learning Scientist (ML) Intern to join our Multimedia Core Service team in Modena, Italy. If you are excited by technology that has the power to handle hundreds of thousands of transactions per second; collect tens of billions of events each day; and evaluate thousands of data-points in real-time all while responding in just a few milliseconds, then IAS is the place for you!

As a ML Scientist Intern you will work on advancing the understanding and application of dimensionality reduction techniques for sparse feature matrices generated by semantic engines. You will prototype, implement and evaluate a range of dimensionality reduction approaches. The second phase of the project will involve comparing the reduced-dimensional embedding spaces with existing pre-trained embeddings, to study similarities, overlaps, and differences in representation. This analysis will provide insights into how rule-based semantic features compare with context-aware neural representations This internship is an opportunity for you to gain practical experience with deep learning, interacting with large scale production environments and having the opportunity to research novel methods that can push the state of the art of media understanding and content evaluation.

What you‚Äôll get to do:


Conduct in-depth research and experimentation on a wide array of dimensionality reduction techniques, with a particular focus on their applicability to sparse feature matrices commonly produced by semantic engines. This will involve prototyping, implementing, and rigorously evaluating methods such as Principal Component Analysis (PCA), Truncated Singular Value Decomposition (SVD), and neural embedding models (e.g., autoencoders).
Leverage these feature representations to construct and train machine learning models that can effectively address a variety of downstream tasks, such as classification, regression, clustering, or anomaly detection.
Work with the framework of your choice, e.g. PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.
Integrate machine learning models into production systems.
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field of machine learning and contribute to knowledge sharing within the team.



You should apply if you have most of this experience:


Currently pursuing a Master‚Äôs or PhD in Computer Science, Mathematics, Computer Engineering, Statistics, or a related field.
Familiarity with machine learning and deep learning methods.
Proficiency in Python and experience with libraries such as NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, PyTorch, and TensorFlow.
Familiarity with SVD, BERT, ViT, or CLIP is a plus.
Experience with Self-Supervised Learning methods is also a plus.



About Integral Ad Science

Integral Ad Science (IAS) is a leading global media measurement and optimization platform that delivers the industry‚Äôs most actionable data to drive superior results for the world‚Äôs largest advertisers, publishers, and media platforms. IAS‚Äôs software provides comprehensive and enriched data that ensures ads are seen by real people in safe and suitable environments, while improving return on ad spend for advertisers and yield for publishers. Our mission is to be the global benchmark for trust and transparency in digital media quality. For more information, visit integralads.com.

Equal Opportunity Employer:

IAS is an equal opportunity employer, committed to our diversity and inclusiveness. We will consider all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, nationality, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, religion, disability or age. We strongly encourage women, people of color, members of the LGBTQIA community, people with disabilities and veterans to apply.

California Applicant Pre-Collection Notice:

We collect personal information (PI) from you in connection with your application for employment or engagement with IAS, including the following categories of PI: identifiers, personal records, commercial information, professional or employment or engagement information, non-public education records, and inferences drawn from your PI. We collect your PI for our purposes, including performing services and operations related to your potential employment or engagement. For additional details or if you have questions, contact us at compliance@integralads.com.

To learn more about us, please visit http://integralads.com/

Attention agency/3rd party recruiters: IAS does not accept any unsolicited resumes or candidate profiles. If you are interested in becoming an IAS recruiting partner, please send an email introducing your company to recruitingagencies@integralads.com. We will get back to you if there's interest in a partnership.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
MotorK is the leading sales and marketing technology company in Europe, specialized in the automotive sector. At MotorK our mission is to empower manufacturers and dealerships to sell more with innovative, cloud-based products and services to offer the best digital customer experience.

We are on a fast and ambitious trajectory and serving 90% of the automotive manufacturers. To continue our growth, we are hiring new talents. If you want to spark the future of the automotive world, join us.





About the Role

As a Machine Learning Engineer at MotorK, you will be pivotal in driving innovation and improving customer experience. You will develop and deploy machine learning models to power automotive maintenance prediction, product classification, and marketing asset generation. Your work will directly impact the company's revenue, customer satisfaction, and overall business success.




What You'll Do

Design, develop, and train machine learning models, including recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and classification algorithms.
Collaborate with data engineers to extract, clean, and transform large datasets from various sources.
Deploy models into production environments, ensuring scalability and reliability.
Conduct A/B testing and other experiments to evaluate the impact of machine learning models on key metrics.
Work closely with product managers and software engineers to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior ML engineers on best practices and business-oriented problem-solving.



Requirements


5+ years experience as a machine learning engineer or data scientist in a digital product environment
Strong foundation in machine learning, including deep learning and statistical modelling.
Proficiency in Python and relevant ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, or XGBoost).
Experience with cloud platforms and MLOps, preferably AWS.
Ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Passion for data-driven innovation and a desire to make a significant impact.



Benefits



Working pattern and location

40 hours per week, permanent contract¬†
Monday - Friday
Hybrid role




Benefits

Meal Vouchers (‚Ç¨7 per working day)
26 days holidays + national bank holidays¬†
Individual training paths
Opportunity to develop and move within the company
National and international mobility options¬†
Yearly team activities
Food canteen at the office




MotorK is an Equal Opportunity Employer and Prohibits Discrimination and Harassment of Any kind. Our company is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at MotorK are based on business needs, job requirements, and individual qualifications, without regard to race, colour, religion or belief, age, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate.

Title: Junior - AI Engineer Milano/Cagliari - Audit & Assurance
Description:
Junior - AI Engineer Milano/Cagliari

Sei pronto a #MakeAnImpactThatMatters nel nostro team Audit & Assurance?

Title: AI & Software Development Engineer
Description:
Gruppo San Donato √® alla ricerca di una risorsa da inserire come AI & Software Development Engineer desideroso di entrare a far parte di un contesto sfidante e in crescita.

La figura del AI & Software Development Engineer verr√† inserita nel team di Segreteria di Presidenza con l‚Äôobiettivo di sviluppare ed ottimizzare i prodotti basati sull‚Äôintelligenza artificiale.

Il candidato ideale √® motivato e dotato di una forte passione per la tecnologia e l‚Äôinnovazione, √® in possesso di una solida comprensione del linguaggio di programmazione Python, preferibilmente con un background statistico e con un‚Äôesperienza/formazione pregressa come Data Analyst.




La risorsa inserita dovr√† occuparsi di:

Contribuire allo sviluppo ed al perfezionamento di prodotti AI, collaborando strettamente con il team di prodotto e tecnologia
Implementare modelli e algoritmi di machine learning utilizzando Python
Analizzare grandi set di dati per trarne insights e guidare le decisioni di sviluppo del prodotto
Testare e validare i modelli di previsione per garantire l‚Äôaccuratezza e l‚Äôefficacia
Preparare report dettagliati sui risultati e le performance dei modelli AI
Mantenere un aggiornamento continuo sulle ultime tendenze e tecnologie con particolare attenzione al campo AI
Progettare, sviluppare, implementare e monitorare sistemi di intelligenza artificiale.




Cosa non pu√≤ mancare?

Almeno 2 anni di esperienza nel ruolo
Conoscenza approfondita del mondo AI, innovazione, tecnologia e forte orientamento all‚Äôoffice automation
Buona conoscenza delle librerie comuni di Data Science come Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow
Ottima conoscenza del pacchetto Office
Ottime doti comunicative e relazionali
Buone doti di scrittura e chiarezza compositiva
Proattivit√†, problem solving, curiosit√† e pensiero innovativo
Ottime doti organizzative e di gestione delle priorit√†
Predisposizione a lavorare in team
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese
Completano il profilo disponibilit√†, flessibilit√† e riservatezza.




Dove?

Via Giovanni Spadolini 4, Milano.




Dettagli lavorativi

Tipo di contratto: subordinato, full time.

La tipologia contrattuale di inserimento verr√† valutata in base all‚Äôesperienza del candidato.

Entrare a far parte del nostro Gruppo significa intraprendere un percorso di sviluppo personale e professionale in cui Innovazione, Umanit√† e Sostenibilit√† siano i valori guida.

Cerchiamo persone entusiaste, che abbiano un approccio proattivo al lavoro, sinceramente interessate al mondo della Sanit√† e pronte a mettersi in gioco in un contesto dinamico e stimolante.

Title: Internship - Data Science
Description:
At ION

We want to innovate the financial services offered by commercial/retail banks in Italy in the areas of wealth management, credit lending, risk management and compliance. Building on our consolidated expertise and product offering in the Capital Markets domain, we want to scale our solutions and frameworks to the commercial/retail banking industry. To do so, we start from the quantitative modelling and analysis of the current processes put in place by our customers, so that we can profile opportunities of automation and prioritize client needs on manual/painful workflows. The resource will be involved in business process analyses of Italian commercial/retail financial institutions and is expected to integrate structured information extracted from interviews with the analysis of literature and documentation to build a quantitative picture of the AS-IS. The analysis will then be complemented with a consequent implementation analysis and product roadmap definition to design the TO-BE and drive product evolutions and developments. The project entails modelling complex business contexts, extracting structured information from unstructured sources, performing quantitative analyses, presenting findings and recommendations to external clients and internal stakeholders, contributing to the definition of product backlogs.

What You Will Learn During Your Intern


Quantitative modelling of business processes
Codification of customer requirements, needs, activities
Business intelligence with PowerBI/Excel - Packaging high-quality deliverables for external clients ‚Äì
Data manipulation with Pandas or Spark/Hive


What You Need To Know


Hands-on experience with BI tools (Excel, PowerBI)
Experience with Python data science libraries (pandas, pyspark, sklearn) is nice to have
Fluent English


We Are Looking For Someone Who


is passionate about modelling unknown business contexts with a quantitative approach
can find a good trade-off between quality and speed of delivery
proactively contribute your insights and ideas in a way that fits existing frameworks of the firm
is fond of sharing knowledge with colleagues and documenting your work
Show more
